resources.string: You have a good memory; you are soft spoken, but you are also very whimsical. You are very sensitive and emotional, and are prone to get nervous easily.
You are very active, lively and have a vivacious demeanor. You have warrior-like qualities. You are brave and serious in your work, and will always have people to help you out.
You are quite witty and have a mind curved specially for business. You are not very organized in your work and have a cluttered thought process as well.

You are wise, optimistic and highly understanding; you are respected a lot and attract plenty of attention wherever you go. You have leadership qualities and are likely to end up in high positions wherever you work and in society as well.

You are the harbinger of peace, love, beauty and pleasure. The creative fields like music, painting, artistry and acting attract you a lot. You are generally happy-go-lucky but sensitive when it comes to relationships. You do not take heartbreaks well and if anything or anyone makes you sad, you mourn over it for too long.
You are generally serious and have a good sense of responsibility which makes you a very trusted person. You are prone to worrying too much and get sad often suddenly by recalling past events.

You have a positive attitude towards life and are generous in nature. You are also very trustworthy. You are most likely to be an introvert and have very few friends. You are very suspicious and do not trust others much.
